resources.name: brazilian-transparency-and-open-data-portals

fields.name: sphere
fields.title: Sphere
fields.description: Federative sphere of the Brazilian public entity. Can be one of these: federal, state, municipality.

fields.name: branch
fields.title: branch
fields.description: Branch of Brazilian administration the entity is situated at. Can be one of these: executive, legislative, judiciary, mp.

fields.name: type
fields.title: type of portal
fields.description:
Type of portal (according to KLEIN, 2017).

SPT: Transparency portal only
PTDAG: Transparency and open data portal
PEDAG: Open data portal

fields.name: notes
fields.title: notes
fields.description: Notes on the surveying of information, e.g., what is the scope of the portal, type categorization, etc.

fields.name: last-verified-auto
fields.title: Last verified (auto)
fields.description: Last time the site was automatically verified to be in working order

fields.name: last-verified-manual
fields.title: Last verified (manual)
fields.description: Last time the site was manually verified to be in working order

resources.title: Brazilian Transparency and Open Data Portals
resources.description: A listing of known transparency and open data portals of Brazilian public administration top level entities (e.g. states, municipalities, etc.).
